alert.note: Alert for Dunn; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 10:03PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dunn and southeastern St. Croix Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1003 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baldwin, or 14 miles northeast of River Falls, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodville around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Glenwood City, Boyceville and Knapp. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 16 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Wisconsin.
